growSchedule.info: Put seeds soil and mist heavily to initiate germination
Put tray on shelf with tray on top with added weight
Set tray under grow light and begin light phase.
Harvest crop and bag per ounce. After completing that, empty and sanitize trays.

cropInfo.notes: Adjust watering schedule as needed. The goal is to use the least amount of water you can, so experiment to find the right balance.
